metadata.name: The General's Letter
metadata.description:
Read Carefully: Return the letter of the heir you DO NOT wish to be in line for the throne before 24th November 2022. The one you keep will be Minted next on SuperRare. If you miss the deadline it will be left to the gods to decide...

Father,

I think the choice you make is a foregone conclusion, I am the only one capable of ruling our country and our people. The people fear me and will obey me.

You know my brother is not fit to rule, even though the people love him, he would be soft and ineffectual. He would rather talk peace with our enemies than fight. He is more concerned with the happiness of our people than making them fear and obey him. 

Therefore you only have one option to make me your successor.

The General

Return address: 0x1E96B3D06C7DcCc94f122F435D989A3EfAe84fF4

Kingdom Of Thieves Airdrops from STR4NGETHING to colletors of pieces pertaining to the Kingdom Of Thieves storyline.
